question: Women played a key role in government code breaking efforts during World War 2 specifically at Bletchley Park helping to break the Enigma code and potentially turning the tide of the war.  What percentage of the workforce at Bletchley Park were female?
In 1757 female ’Human Computer’ Nicole-Reine Etable de la Brière Lepaute successfully helped to predict date on which a famous comet would be visible from earth.  Can you name the Comet?
In 1945 ENIAC was completed.  It was the first programmable, electronic general purpose computer and it’s 6 primary programmers were all female.  What does ENIAC stand for?
In America computers were used for space travel calculations by NASA.  What does NASA stand for?
The Great Firewall is an internet regulation system in place in which Asian Country?
Ada Lovelace wrote the first algorithm designed for implementation on a computer in 1842.  Which poet was her father?
